commands: execute as @s[tag=satsu.iron.man.enable.armor,scores={satsu.iron.man.animation.armor=1}] run tag @s remove sentinel.false
execute as @s[tag=!satsu.iron.man.enable.armor,scores={satsu.iron.man.animation.armor=1}] run tag @s remove sentinel.false

conditions.command: execute if entity @e[tag=sentinel,sort=nearest,distance=0..3] if score @s grave.ID = @e[tag=sentinel,limit=1,sort=nearest] grave.ID

enabling.command: execute if entity @e[tag=sentinel,sort=nearest,distance=0.1..0.5] if score @s grave.ID = @e[tag=sentinel,limit=1,sort=nearest] grave.ID

conditions.command: execute if entity @e[tag=sentinel,sort=nearest,distance=0..3] if score @s grave.ID = @e[tag=sentinel,limit=1,sort=nearest] grave.ID

commands: execute anchored feet rotated ~ 0 if entity @e[sort=nearest,limit=2,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] run tp @e[sort=nearest,limit=2,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] ^ ^0.4 ^1.2
execute if entity @e[sort=nearest,limit=2,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] run tag @s add grave.pick.grabbing
execute unless entity @e[sort=nearest,limit=2,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] run scoreboard players add @s grave.pick.timer 1

first_tick_commands: execute as @e[sort=nearest,limit=1,tag=grave.pick.picked,distance=0..9] at @s run scoreboard players set @s grave.pick.throw 1
